metadata.title: Ripple Junction Bleach Kurosaki Ichigo tensa Zangetsu Banaki Anime Manga Men's T-Shirt
features: SOUL REAPERS UNITE: Enjoy geeking out while wearing your favorite Bleach merch!

FANDOMS ARE THE BEST: Face it, we all love a good fandom. How about representing your favorite anime while rocking this sweet Bleach shirt? Our Bleach tees are more than just a t-shirt. They are a way to bond with friends.

WHAT’S MY SIZE AGAIN?: Forget your size after binging all night? We’ve got you. This cool shirt is available in sizes XS–3XL. Body width measurements in inches: XS (16.5), S (18), M (20), L (22), XL (24), 2XL (26), and 3XL (28).

SHIRTS FOR FANS: Say hello to our authentic Bleach merch. This lightweight crew-neck shirt is made from a high quality cotton. We know there’s nothing better than hyping up your favorite themes while being comfy. Thank us later.
CARE: Machine wash cold with like colors, tumble dry low, do not bleach, do not iron
description: BLEACH Ichigo Kurosaki never asked for the ability to see ghosts -- he was born with the gift. When his family is attacked by a Hollow -- a malevolent lost soul -- Ichigo becomes a Soul Reaper, dedicating his life to protecting the innocent and helping the tortured spirits themselves find peace. OFFICIALLY LICENSED BLEACH APPAREL Officially licensed apparel and high-quality prints on this Bleach t-shirt make it the perfect gift for men everywhere. Whether it be for and achievement, Halloween, Christmas or a birthday. CREW CUT NECK Short sleeves and a classic crew cut neck make these comfortable t-shirts men will love to wear. MENS SIZES Prints are available in mens clothing sizes: Small, Medium, Large, X-Large, XX-Large and XXX-Large
